experience.title: Web Scraper
experience.description: Web Scraper | Python | Beautifulsoup‚Ä¢ Built a web scraper and implemented it to retrieve data from the online website Amazon with just the URL of the page‚Ä¢ Implemented the model using python libraries Beautifulsoup, RegEx, sqlite3, and Request modules to retrieve data‚Ä¢ Stored the data in SQLite DataBase (using DB Browser), to help visualize and process the data more efficiently‚Ä¢ Currently working on expanding the model on other shopping sites, to provide an efficient way to compare andanalyse the data

experience.title: Team Member
